# Darwhin Gomez

**Email:** Darwhin88@gmail.com  |  **Phone:** 347-491-2955  |  **LinkedIn:** [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/darwhin)  |  **GitHub:** [GitHub](https://github.com/dw8888)  
**Location:** New York, New York

---

## Summary
Solutions-focused technologist with experience designing AWS architectures, automated data pipelines, and agentic AI tooling that shortens feedback loops and accelerates application throughput.

---

## Core Skills
- **Programming:** Python, SQL, Java, .NET  
- **Cloud:** AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS, DynamoDB), Azure  
- **Machine Learning:** Scikit-learn, PyTorch, SageMaker  
- **Data Management:** ETL/ELT, Data Modeling, NoSQL  
- **Automation:** CI/CD, Docker, Agile/Scrum  
- **Security:** SIEM, Active Directory, Linux  

---

## Experience
### Solutions Architect Intern  
**Amazon Web Services (AWS)**  | Arlington, VA (Remote/Hybrid)  | Jun 2025 – Sep 2025  
- Designed AWS architectures for enterprise customers, enhancing scalability and security.  
- Automated sentiment-analysis pipeline for 1M+ records, achieving 5x faster feedback loops.  
- Fine-tuned models in SageMaker, improving accuracy by ~5% and reducing toxicity by ~8%.  

### Software Developer Intern  
**WOPLLI Technologies**  | Remote, NY  | Jun 2024 – Sep 2024  
- Developed API integration scripts, enhancing system interoperability and efficiency.  
- Designed Virtual Credential System, improving decentralized identity management.  

### IT Support Intern  
**Mayor’s Office of Information Services**  | New York, NY  | Feb 2024 – May 2024  
- Automated troubleshooting workflows, reducing manual workload and improving response times.  
- Supported VIP users with secure access, enhancing organizational security posture.  

### IT Instructor Assistant  
**RF CUNY & Generation USA**  | Remote, NY  | Feb 2022 – Aug 2023  
- Delivered 36 lessons to 200+ learners, achieving a 96% cohort graduation rate.  
- Developed testing materials and tracked student engagement, improving instructional effectiveness.  

---

## Projects
### Alfred – Personal Agentic Job Search Assistant  
- Developed FastAPI + OpenAI GPT-4 system, reducing application time by 60% and boosting weekly applications by 300%.  
- Designed PostgreSQL schema for job data, enhancing data retrieval efficiency.  

---

## Education
**Master of Science – Data Science and Machine Learning**  
City University of New York – School of Professional Studies  | Expected Jan 2026  
- GPA: 4.0, Dean’s List 2x  

**Bachelor of Technology – Computer Information Systems**  
City University of New York – NYC College of Technology  | Jun 2024  
- GPA: 3.78, Dean’s List (5x), National Honor Society  

---

## Certifications
- AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Associate  
- AWS Certified AI Practitioner – Generative AI  
- Google Cybersecurity Certificate  
- Google Information Support Certificate  

---

## Interests
AI Ethics, Cybersecurity, Data Science, Basketball, Chess
